Title: Prohibits the sale of flavored tobacco products
Summary: Prohibits the sale of flavored tobacco products; violation by any person other than manufacturer constitutes fine of $100 for each individual package sold or offered for sale; provides for a civil penalty up to $50,000 for violations within a thirty day period for manufacturers; affirmative defense.
LawCode: Add Art 13-F ยง1399-aa-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of flavored tobacco products
